title: Schema for Espanso Packages Readme
description: The front matter that goes along with an Espanso Package.

package_name.description: The name of the package (must be the same as the directory).

package_title.description: Human friendly version of the package name.

package_desc.description: A short description of the package & its contents.

package_version.description: The version of the package, you should not change this one when you first start your package.

package_repo.description: The URL of repository for this package.
